sub_title: Reliability Lead Europe, Middle East and Africa bij Becht
summary:
Experienced manager in Maintenance, Reliability and Engineering. Worked 33 years with Shell and since 2016 with EPS Customer Solutions as Managing Consultant Maintenance, Reliability and Engineering.

People oriented management style with a clear business focus, very strong hands-on skills and experience in implementation, stakeholder - and change management. 

Leadership and coaching of joined customer teams, extensive line management experience as Project Services team lead (~ 60 staff), Site Maintenance Manager (~ 50 staff) and Engineering Manager (~90 staff). 

Advice to worldwide refining, gas, exploration & production facilities. Conducted numerous reviews and workshops on Operations and Asset Management in Oman, Norway, The Netherlands, Germany, Sweden, UK, Argentina, Canada, Nigeria, Brazil, Russia, Canada, USA, etc. Team leader for a number of Asset Management studies and implementations. 

Programme manager for two Asset Management programmes for a client in the steel industry. Specialist areas include: Operations & Asset Management (Reviews), Maintenance Management, Turnaround Management and Reliability Management. Successful delivery of these programmes to a range of Shell and non-Shell customers all over the world, has provided extensive experience in implementation.
